thread.title: Hero paramedic jumps into freezing lake to save drowning baby whose parents died within hours of each other
thread.title_full: Hero paramedic jumps into freezing lake to save drowning baby whose parents died within hours of each other

author: Nicola Oakley
title: Hero paramedic jumps into freezing lake to save drowning baby whose parents died within hours of each other
text:
News Hero paramedic jumps into freezing lake to save drowning baby whose parents died within hours of each other The man suffered from hypothermia after the rescue after spotting the baby, who was so still he first thought it was a doll Share Zobrist insists it was just a case of 'right place, right time' (Photo: Facebook) Share Get daily   Thank you for subscribing! Could not subscribe, try again later Invalid Email 
A paramedic is being hailed a hero after he jumped into a freezing-cold lake to save the life of a young baby, risking his own life without hesitation. 
Todd Zobrist, from Illinois, USA, spotted the headlights of a car submerged in a lake on Thursday morning and instinctively knew there must be someone inside. 
After realising he didn't have time to wait for the emergency responders to arrive, he stripped off his shirt, socks and boots and jumped in to the below-freezing water, swimming 75feet to the car. 
Arriving at the car, Zobrist looked inside the vehicle and saw something in the back seat which he initially thought was a doll, but turned out to be a three-month-old baby boy. 
Even more heroically, he performed CPR on the child on the roof of the vehicle until he coughed up water. Zobrist then swam back to shore with one arm, carrying the boy in the other. 
"When I got halfway there I was thoroughly thinking to myself, 'This is a terrible decision and I really need to just turn around and go back to the dock because I'm going to get myself in a lot of trouble,' Zobrist said at a news conference Friday. 
"At that point, though, I was committed, I was already wet, I was already cold." Video Loading Click to play Tap to play The video will start in 8 Cancel Play now
